import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Col, Row, ListGroup, Image, Card, Button, ListGroupItem, } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = (props) => { const params = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === props.params.id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} In Stock: ${product.countInStock} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
